BspDependency.Name: BUS IO driver
BspDependency.Comment: The SPI is capable to drive the Bluetooth Low Energy module

BspDependency.Name: Exti Line
BspDependency.Comment: Interrupt from Bluetooth Low Energy module

BspDependency.Name: CS Line
BspDependency.Comment: Chip Select for the Bluetooth Low Energy module

BspDependency.Name: Reset Line
BspDependency.Comment: Generate a reset to the Bluetooth Low Energy module

BspDependency.Name: BSP LED
BspDependency.Comment: Use the User Led for this application

BspDependency.Name: BSP BUTTON
BspDependency.Comment: Use the User Button for this application

BspDependency.Name: BSP USART
BspDependency.Comment: Use an USART for this application

RefParameter.Name: BLE1_DEBUG
RefParameter.Description:
Print messages from files at user level:
0: No debug message is shown
1: Debug messages are shown

RefParameter.Name: PRINT_CSV_FORMAT
RefParameter.Description:
Print the data travelling over the SPI in the .csv format compatible with the ST BlueNRG GUI:
0: CSV format message print disabled
1: CSV format message print enabled

PossibleValue.Comment: 128 Bytes reserved for HCI Read Packet
256 Bytes reserved for HCI Read Packet
128 Bytes reserved for HCI Max Payload
256 Bytes reserved for HCI Max Payload

RefParameter.Name: SCAN_P
RefParameter.Description:
Time interval from when the Controller started its last LE scan until it begins the subsequent LE scan.
It must be a number in the range from 4 (0x0004) to 16384 (0x4000).
This corresponds to a time range from 2.5 to 10240 msec (for a number N, Time = N x 0.625 msec).

RefParameter.Name: SCAN_L
RefParameter.Description:
Amount of time for the duration of the LE scan.
It must be a number in the range from 4 (0x0004) to 16384 (0x4000).
This corresponds to a time range from 2.5 to 10240 msec (for a number N, Time = N x 0.625 msec).

RefParameter.Name: SUPERV_TIMEOUT
RefParameter.Description:
It must be a number in the range from 10 (0x000A) to 3200(0x0C80).
This corresponds to a time range from 100 msec to 32 sec (for a number N, Time = N x 10 msec).

RefParameter.Name: CONN_P1
RefParameter.Description:
Minimum value for the connection event interval.
It shall be less than or equal to the maximum connection event interval.
Its range is from 6 (0x0006) to 3200 (0x0C80) that corresponds to a time range from 7.5 msec to 4 seconds (for a number N, Time = N x 1.25 msec).

RefParameter.Name: CONN_P2
RefParameter.Description:
Maximum value for the connection event interval.
It shall be greater than or equal to the minimum connection event interval.
Its range is from 6 (0x0006) to 3200 (0x0C80) that corresponds to a time range from 7.5 msec to 4 seconds (for a number N, Time = N x 1.25 msec).

RefParameter.Name: CONN_L1
RefParameter.Description:
Minimum length of connection needed for the LE connection.
It must be a number in the range from 0 (0x0000) to 65535 (0xFFFF) that corresponds to a time range from 0 msec to 40 seconds (for a number N, Time = N x 0.625 msec).

RefParameter.Name: CONN_L2
RefParameter.Description:
Maximum length of connection needed for the LE connection.
It must be a number in the range from 0 (0x0000) to 65535 (0xFFFF) that corresponds to a time range from 0 msec to 40 seconds (for a number N, Time = N x 0.625 msec).

RefParameter.Name: ADV_DATA_TYPE
RefParameter.Description:
Advertising Types
ADV_IND: Connectable Undirected Advertising
ADV_SCAN_IND: Scannable Undirected Advertising
ADV_NONCONN_IND: Non Connectable Undirected Advertising

RefParameter.Name: ADV_INTERV_MIN
RefParameter.Description:
It must be a number in the range from 32 (0x0020) to 16384 (0x4000) that corresponds to a time range from 20 msec to 10.24 sec (for a number N, Time = N x 0.625 msec).
The default value is 1.28 sec.
For ADV_SCAN_IND or ADV_NONCONN_IND the minimum time is 100 msec.
If both ADV_INTERV_MIN and ADV_INTERV_MAX are set to 0, the Generic Access Profile (GAP) uses the default values for advertising intervals.

RefParameter.Name: ADV_INTERV_MAX
RefParameter.Description:
It must be a number in the range from 32 (0x0020) to 16384 (0x4000) that corresponds to a time range from 20 msec to 10.24 sec (for a number N, Time = N x 0.625 msec).
The default value is 2.56 sec.
For ADV_SCAN_IND or ADV_NONCONN_IND the minimum time is 100 msec.
If both ADV_INTERV_MIN and ADV_INTERV_MAX are set to 0, the Generic Access Profile (GAP) uses the default values for advertising intervals.

RefParameter.Name: L2CAP_INTERV_MIN
RefParameter.Description:
It is a parameter of an L2CAP Connection Parameter Update request from a slave to the master.
It must be a number in the range from 6 (0x0006) to 3200 (0x0C80) that corresponds to a time range from 7.5 msec to 4000 msec (for a number N, Time = N x 1.25 msec).
It shall be less than or equal to the Maximum Connection Event Interval (L2CAP_INTERV_MAX).

RefParameter.Name: L2CAP_INTERV_MAX
RefParameter.Description:
It is a parameter of an L2CAP Connection Parameter Update request from a slave to the master.
It must be a number in the range from 6 (0x0006) to 3200 (0x0C80) that corresponds to a time range from 7.5 msec to 4000 msec (for a number N, Time = N x 1.25 msec).
It shall be greater than or equal to the Minimum Connection Event Interval (L2CAP_INTERV_MIN).

RefParameter.Name: L2CAP_TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER
RefParameter.Description:
It is a parameter of an L2CAP Connection Parameter Update request from a slave to the master.
It defines the Connection Timeout parameter in the following manner: Timeout Multiplier * 10ms.

PossibleValue.Comment: Basic HCI Transport Layer (use a basic set of already implemented APIs)
Template for HCI Transport Layer (the user can customize the available set of APIs)

Condition.Diagnostic: Request the API BLE Transport Layer

PossibleValue.Comment: HCI Transport Layer Interface based on User Board definition (use a basic set of already implemented APIs)
Template for HCI Transport Layer Interface (the user can customize the available set of APIs)
SensorDemo sample application for the ST BLE Sensor app
